text: Norm Crewther (14 May 1919 – 20 October 2010) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). Norm is the nephew of Collingwood great Bill Proudfoot, and was the oldest living former Collingwood player until his passing in 2010. Norm is the second great uncle of the former Federal Member for Dunkley, Chris Crewther MP. == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1919 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Norm Crewther
